title: Only essential services should report to work today (12)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Government said that identified personnel from essential services should report to work and others can work from home on Thursday (12).
A senior Government spokesman said the employees could be called in after identifying service requirements.
Meanwhile, the curfew lifted at 7 AM today (12) will be imposed again from 2 PM.
North Korea Confirms 1st Covid Case, Declares “Severe National Emergency”
